fulltext:
Tejas Soni 
Web Developer with 9+ years of Experience 
Email   : tejas.soni2@gmail.com 
Career Objective 
I am having 9+ years of Information Technology experience. all of his experience are relevant in object-
oriented, web based applications software design and software development using PHP and I am a diligent 
hard worker who always tries to add value to every project I am involved in. 
Major Strengths: 
 
Over 9+ Years of experience in Web Development including Analysis, Design, Development, Testing  and  
Implementation using PHP and other hosted solutions Technologies. 
 
My main area of experience has been application design, application development, unit & integration  
testing, production support & enhancement of various size projects. 
 
Expertise in  programming skills and development experience of multi-tier web applications, enterprise  
Applications in languages/technologies like PHP, Codeigniter, CakePHP, Laravel, Magento, WordPress,          
Drupal, Shopify, Volusion, 3dcart, Web services, RestFul APIs that ensures clear separation of layers 
and rapid application development. 
 
Extensive experience in developing web application using Codeigniter, Laravel, CakePHP Framework,  
Model View Controller (MVC) Architecture. 
 
Developing Front-End using HTML, XML, CSS, jQuery, JSON, XML, JavaScript, AJAX. 
 
Experience in Service Oriented Applications using RESTFUL. 
 
Experience with Version control systems such as SVN and GitHub. 
 
Experience in preparing project related documents using Microsoft Office Suite like MS-Office, MS-Excel,  
MS-PowerPoint and etc.  
 
Experience in Windows XP/ Vista, Windows7, Unix 
 
Integration with Paypal, Google Map and Facebook using API. 
 
Experience with Search Engine Optimization (SEO). 
 
Details knowledge of cron jobs, high traffic website performance tuning. 
 
I have worked on many projects on eCommerce like Shopify, Volusion, Magento, 3dcart, Drupal, 
Woocommerce. I have shared very few over here. 
Education 
Masters in Computer Application [ M.C.A ], Gujarat University, Ahmedabad, India, May 2009 
Bachelors in Commerce [ B.Com. ], Gujarat University, Ahmadabad, India, May 2005
